name: Adventure Rush!
description:
Take on the role of a brave adventurer along his journey through different worlds and help him make it out alive either avoiding enemies or  making your way through them with your sword in this pixel art fantasy set up.

Pick up several power-ups along the way and change your equipment between different swords, each one with unique effects.

Born as a little browser-oriented project, "Adventure Rush!" offers 5 short but intense levels that will test your skills.
